title: Southern Bancorp CEO: Average Home Prices Ticking Up
description:
Darrin Williams, CEO of Southern Bancorp, says affordability, particularly down payments, remains the biggest deterrent for families. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.”
 (Source: Bloomberg)
